decisions.rationale: PR #913 fix verified complete via code review, test results (35/35), and DryRun validation. Issue remained open due to GitHub auto-close not triggering from PR body reference.
Commit f7666bdf claimed to fix #843, #732, and #841. More efficient to verify existing fixes than duplicate work.

decisions.decision: Close all four Critical Path 1 issues
decisions.rationale: All fixes verified complete: #910 (PR #913), #843/#732/#841 (commit f7666bdf). Documentation added to closure comments for future reference.

outcome.summary: Critical Path 1 complete - all four P1 issues verified and closed. #910 (PR #913 ADR-017 fix), #843 (bash 3 portability), #732 (false E_INVESTIGATION_HAS_IMPL), #841 (test failures). Pre-commit hook now stable for macOS and Linux.
